content:
Hey. I'm looking for the complete json schema for the FHIR standard. There's a package downloadable from the main site, but it appears to be lacking at least one resource (DomainResource) is not defined anywhere. When attempting to validate the schema file (fhir.schema.json) against the draft 4 of the json-schema spec, I get the following:

JSON::Schema::SchemaError: The fragment '/definitions/DomainResource' does not exist on schema http://hl7.org/fhir/json-schema/fhir#
hm, then that's an underlying problem. how are you validating the json schema?
(as you have found, it's a work in progress)
